summary: My name is Vivian Kamphuis. Currently I am a resident in Pediatrics in The Netherlands. In January 2019 I have obtained my PhD in Pediatric Cardiology (mainly on 4D Flow MRI and vectorcardiography). I have a documented portfolio in clinical research, electrocardiography, cardiac magnetic resonance imaging and pediatric cardiology. Outside of my medical career, I am also passionate about imaging: My photos can be seen on my website  (http://www.vivianpaola.com) and prints of my photos can be bought on https://www.werkaandemuur.nl/nl/beeldmaker/Vivian-Paola/118313
